channel.title: Mitb: Fix the warning system, imo
channel.description: Well, the warning system needs quite a look taken at it, because Niall is the only fucker who expires warnings, the rest just tell you too piss off. That, or drop the shit forum software.

item.title: Mitb: Fix the warning system, imo
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

[quote=“IP-Drowner, post:38, topic:185200”][quote author=``jason link=topic=246944.msg2102572#msg2102572 date=1205229845]

It’s strange, warnings are actually harder to get than rep. I’ve said multiple offensive things to people. And I’ve gotten off scott free. But if I were to say… something remotely funny about someone a lot of people hate. rep++ x8.

I seem to get them every time I open my mouth, I beg to differ.

Same here, i have been with the forums for about a year now and i only got 2 reps :0
[/quote]
Well have you been polite, helpful and honest? That is probably why you haven’t got more reputation than others.[/quote]
Point taken.

Read full topic
item.source: Mitb: Fix the warning system, imo

item.title: Mitb: Fix the warning system, imo
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:32, topic:185200”]Yeah, in other words, USER PRUNE.

That way it wont take 10 minutes to ban someone.[/quote]

Pruning users has nothing to do with it, only pruning ban items improves things.

And warnings will auto-expire now within 7 days give or take an hour.

Read full topic
item.source: Mitb: Fix the warning system, imo

item.source: Mitb: Fix the warning system, imo

item.title: Mitb: Fix the warning system, imo
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“IP-Drowner, post:28, topic:185200”]Well the warning system is there for a reason. It should be used when some one breaks a rule. But if the only person that removes the warnings is Niall then something should be fixed. If you get a warning, it is your fault for getting it for breaking a rule.

bowserjr2:

What about reinstall the SMF, but keep all the tread and post.

How is that supposed to fix things? If you re-install SMF on a server it over-writes the threads and posts and all user accounts.

Just leave things the way they’re as they’re good at the moment.[/quote]
No it wont, just install on a another database and then connect SMF to the old database.

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:27, topic:185200”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=246944.msg2097413#msg2097413 date=1205046290]
What about reinstall the SMF, but keep all the tread and post.
[/quote]

That wouldn’t fix anything.[/quote]
Are you sure?
If the are some error maybe a clean install can fix it.
But you are the master so i think you know what that work and what that don’t.

Read full topic
item.source: Mitb: Fix the warning system, imo

item.title: Mitb: Fix the warning system, imo
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

Doesn’t seem like a very hard script, but it should be something like this:

if($day = $warndate + $days[30])
{
  $takewarnoff;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Mitb: Fix the warning system, imo
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

Well the warning system is there for a reason. It should be used when some one breaks a rule. But if the only person that removes the warnings is Niall then something should be fixed. If you get a warning, it is your fault for getting it for breaking a rule.

What about reinstall the SMF, but keep all the tread and post.
How is that supposed to fix things? If you re-install SMF on a server it over-writes the threads and posts and all user accounts.

Just leave things the way they’re as they’re good at the moment.

Read full topic

[/quote]
Its very easy to get warn, just begin to talk off-topic or be offensive against people from Sweden.

What about reinstall the SMF, but keep all the tread and post.[/quote]

Do you have any idea how much haxing having a joint forum takes?

I have noticed an increase in its use, yes.

item.description:

[quote=“Greeny, post:16, topic:185200”][quote author=ruler link=topic=246944.msg2093602#msg2093602 date=1204931189]
Mebe instead of having all thses negative things like
“Warned”, “Muted”, “banned”

have awards also like “Helpful”, “Informative”
[/quote]

That’s what rep is meant for.[/quote]
I think we have a Batman Reward for thing like that.
Rep does don’t say anything since there are no rule for giving it to other.
